root.name: Under Defeat HD
root.description: OverviewUnder Defeat HD is an updated port of G.rev's Under Defeat. It features HD graphics and a new widescreen mode with twin stick control, and was released in Japan on February 23, 2012.On August 22, 2012, Rising Star Games announced that this game will be released this fall for the Playstation 3 and PSN, while Europe will also get the game for the Xbox 360. The game will be available as a Deluxe Edition which includes:All the current DLC and PatchesDigital Art BookSoundtrack CD that features tracks from New Order modeLetter from Executive Producer Hiroyuki Maruyama
